document.full_text: after talks with leaders of congress failed to yield a budget deal, president obama said there was 'no excuse' for the impasse, and republican leaders widened their push for cuts.
document.title: budget stances harden as deadline nears for shutdown
lines_and_colors: after talks with leaders of congress failed to yield a budget deal, president obama said there was 'no excuse' for the impasse, and republican leaders widened their push for cuts.
